Definition at line 30 of file robot.h.

Member Function Documentation

void Robot::setCheckPoints ( double  obst_r  ) 

This Determines the locations of the points to be checked in the Vehicle Coordinates, should be rotated at each node

Based on our environment, the narrowest passage is X pixels of width and this should be taken into consideration while expanding and checking for collision. check my "An Efficient Path Planner for Large Mobile Platforms" paper for more information
